title: Remove leading bid
description: Removes the leading bid from an auction. To remove a bid, you must be the seller of the auction.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the auction to remove the bid from. You must be logged in as the seller of the auction.

fields.name: BidAmount
fields.description: The value of the bid to remove, in New Zealand dollars.

fields.name: BidderId
fields.description: The ID of the member who placed the bid.

returns.description: <RemoveBidResponse> Indicates whether or not the operation succeeded.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
